Qualifiers.Applicability: All below-grade patios on a lot

Dimensional.Name: Combined area of all below-grade patios
Dimensional.Value: 2% of the lot area or 200 sf

Material.Name: Screening
Material.Condition: as determined appropriate by Planning Dept

Environmental.Name: Drainage system
Environmental.Condition: must be approved by Public Works Department

Numerical values.Name: Maximum combined length of encroaching features

Specs.Name: Lot coverage
Specs.Condition: Overhangs or canopies count towards lot coverage

Procedures.Name: Approval
Procedures.Condition: Public Works Department must approve drainage system

Mandatory: Below-grade patios may not be located on the side of the structure that faces the front yard
Public Works Department must approve drainage system
Such areas to be architecturally compatible with residence
Such areas to be screened to off site views by means of landscaping and/or fencing as determined appropriate by Planning Dept

Conditional logic.Condition: Combined area of all below-grade patios
Conditional logic.Logic: not to exceed 2% of the area of the lot or 200 sf, whichever is greater

Special cases.Condition: Area devoted to required stairway egress
Special cases.Exception: shall not be included in the 200 sf limitation

Cross-references.Description: Examples of site plan w/below-grade patios
